item.title: Universal reopening Stardust Racers ride two weeks after man's death

item.title: A hurricane sank a Spanish fleet in 1715. This summer, salvagers found $1M in coins
item.description: A team of treasure hunters announced this week they had uncovered a load of Spanish coins they estimate is worth $1 million

item.title: All injured in deadly North Carolina waterfront bar shooting released from hospital
item.description: Six people hospitalized after a deadly shooting at a North Carolina coastal bar have all been released
